definition: to harness/to draw (a cart etc)/to drive/to pilot/to sail/to ride/your good self/prefixed word denoting respect (polite 敬辞)
to gallop/speedily/to proceed to/to pilot (ship, plane etc)/to sail

sentences.english: The new Air Force chiefs were talking about how awesome drones were.
sentences.chinese: 空军的新首长正在谈论无人驾驶飞机是多么厉害。

sentences.english: Scientists in Germany have unveiled the latest self-driven car.
sentences.chinese: 德国科学家揭秘了最新一代的无人驾驶汽车。

sentences.english: That equpment includes unmanned, remote-controlled, deep-water submarines.
sentences.chinese: 这道具转换包括无人驾驶，远程控制，深水潜艇。

sentences.english: This signals China can develop its own technology for automatic subways.
sentences.chinese: 这预示这中国开始有能力自主研发地铁无人驾驶技术。

sentences.english: Laser-guided missiles andbombs have become drones’ weapons of choice.
sentences.chinese: 激光制导导弹和炸弹已成为无人驾驶飞机的首选武器。

sentences.english: UTRI has been recognised at a European level for its excellence in unmanned technology.
sentences.chinese: UTRI的无人驾驶技术已达到欧洲先进水平。

sentences.english: Driverless cars have been the subject of popular imagination for decades.
sentences.chinese: 几十年来，无人驾驶汽车一直是大家热衷幻想的话题。

sentences.english: Baitullah Mehsud was eliminated by a drone strike in August 2009.
sentences.chinese: 马哈苏德被淘汰在2009年8月由无人驾驶罢工。

sentences.english: The company expects its six-car fleet to grow to a dozen by the end of the year.
sentences.chinese: 该公司预计年底上路公测的无人驾驶车将增加一倍。

sentences.english: Google's self-driving car hit a small bump in the road.
sentences.chinese: 谷歌的无人驾驶汽车偶然发现了路上的一个小凸起。

sentences.english: So did its role in drone proliferation trouble Aeryon?
sentences.chinese: 所以其在无人驾驶扩散麻烦Aeryon的作用？

sentences.english: Audi was showing a self-driving A7.
sentences.chinese: 奥迪展出了一款无人驾驶的A7汽车。

definition: Tesla (unit)/Nikola Tesla (1856-1943), Serbian inventor and engineer
SenseTime, artificial intelligence company focused on computer vision and deep learning technologies, founded in Hong Kong in 2014
Uber, app-based taxi company founded in 2009
Elon Musk (1971-), business magnate and co-founder of Tesla Motors
Google, Internet company and search engine
